wikipedia_page.main: Richard Ward (born 17 November 1973) is an English former professional footballer, who played for Notts County and Huddersfield Town.

link_mentions.page: List of Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players

response: *Richard Ward (governor) (1689–1763), governor of the Colony of Rhode Island and Providence Plantations
*Sir Richard Warde or Ward (died 1578), English politician and royal official
*USS J. Richard Ward (DE-243), named for James R. Ward
* Eric Richard Ward (1959–2017), founder of NetPOST and URLwire
* James R. Ward (James Richard Ward, 1921–1941), US Navy sailor who died on board the battleship USS Oklahoma (BB-37) during the attack on Pearl Harbor
* Richard Ward Pelham (1815–1876), American blackface performer
